analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders a shop-cart SVG icon with customizable fill color and class attributes.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable, configurable shopping cart icon for use throughout the application’s UI.

Components.name: IconShopcart
Components.responsibility: Renders an SVG of a shopping cart; exposes a 'fill' prop to change icon color; forwards CSS classes via $attrs.

fill.description: Determines the fill color of the SVG paths.

Dependencies: CSS variable '--black' (used in default fill value)
analysis.Usage: Imported into other Vue components or pages via `import IconShopcart from 'modules/icons/entities/IconShopcart.vue'`, then used in templates as `<IconShopcart fill="red" class="my-icon"/>`.
Notes: No local <style> block; styling is expected to be applied via passed-in CSS classes or global styles.
Uses `$attrs.class` to forward any class attribute to the <path> elements, enabling custom sizing, color overrides, etc.
Purely presentational – no reactive state or lifecycle hooks.
